title: Ive been on the same account for nearly 3 years now and dont have the password for my old email.
body: My friend Aaron made this account for me cause I didn't have internet at the time and made the email for me which we both have forgotten the password too. Ive leveled it up from 1 - 30 all by my self. Spent around 1000 dollars on the game since its easily my favorite game and would love some help in being able to change the email from **[Email Redacted]** to my current email I have used for the last couple of years which for some reason didn't work at the time which is **[Email Redacted]**. This would help me a lot if someone from Riot could help me immediately cause I really need it. Thanks. I'm willing to give details to a Riot employee to show i'm not scamming.

replies.body:
Hey there,

First off, please remove any personal details from your post as this could pose a security risk to your account.

* Your email addresses
* Real names

Second, you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can deal with account-related issues.
